name: Boogie#3 Metropolis 2021/1MB
description: Metropolis, the 3rd digitally manipulated image of the “Boogie” gif-series originates from Mood (img#2). Like the domino effect, this series emerges as a coherent sequence, a kind of chain reaction in which the previous work forms the starting point for the next. The finished series is then to be understood as a closed information cycle.
